snippet: The contract of Whitlock, who was dismissed as the editor in chief of ESPN’s yet-to-be-launched website The Undefeated, which will address sports and race, will be bought out by the network, SI.com reported.
lead_paragraph: The contract of Whitlock, who was dismissed as the editor in chief of ESPN’s yet-to-be-launched website The Undefeated, which will address sports and race, will be bought out by the network, SI.com reported.

headline.main: Jason Whitlock and ESPN Part Ways
headline.print_headline: Jason Whitlock and ESPN Part Ways
